details.description: Get help using VAT online services, including how to sign up for services, submitting your VAT returns, changing your registration details and getting refunds
details.body:
Get help using VAT online services, including how to sign up for services, submitting your VAT returns, changing your registration details and getting refunds.

VAT Online Services Helpdesk

Telephone: 0845 010 8500
Textphone: 0845 000 0200
From outside the UK: +44 (0)2920 501 261
Monday to Friday, 8am to 6pm

Get information about:

  • signing up for VAT online
  • sending your VAT Return online
  • service availability

details.description: Includes online returns, rates, charging and record keeping
Includes VAT, debt and inheritance tax
VAT - how to register, effective date of registration, registration thresholds, de-register (cancel) or transfer a VAT registration
Send your VAT Returns online - return boxes, deadlines, penalties and surcharges, corrections, bad debts and final VAT Returns
Get information about VAT, including how to pay and penalties for mistakes and delays when paying
